file_content.text: Thanks to you, I'm sure to be promoted to captain this time!
Recover the holocron and take it to Master Dolso of the Jedi.
Ah. You must be the one the Republic sent. About time you got here!
I'm glad to see they sent a Jedi. Obviously, they're starting to realize how important I am.
I knew they'd send someone to help me out. I was hoping for a Jedi, but I guess a soldier will do.
I was expecting a soldier or maybe even a Jedi, but I'm sure you're very capable in your own way.
Ah. You must be the ones the Republic sent. About time you got here!
I'm glad they sent more than one person. Obviously, they're starting to appreciate how important I am.
I'm surprised no one responded to my request in person, though. It's almost like the Republic commanders are ignoring me.
I'm sorry. I don't know you.
Well, that's just great! Once again, the Republic is too busy to listen to lowly Lieutenant Weeznod of House Organa!
I don't blame them.
Do you know who I am? I'm Lieutenant Weeznod--the twenty-third highest ranking officer in all of House Organa!
Or maybe it's twenty-fourth. Someone may have been promoted above me last week. It's hard to keep track.
Refresh my memory. What exactly was I supposed to do for you?
Uh... no. They sent me.
Refresh your memory? Oh, I get it. This is just one big joke to you.
Let's make fun of Lieutenant Weeznod from House Organa! He's just a loser. He's never in charge of anything important.
But if I get that holocron back, you'll be looking at Captain Weeznod! Then people will give me the respect I deserve!
If you're only doing your job to get promoted, that could be why nobody respects you.
Is that all you care about?
They're just jealous. My family is a wealthy supporter of House Organa, so I didn't have to enlist as some lowly private.
But I can see the Republic doesn't care about any of that. Obviously, no one else is coming. You're the only one who can help me.
Your name is Weeznod. Nobody's ever going to respect you.
Don't count on it.
The Weeznods have a long and proud tradition! We've been supporters of House Organa for centuries!
Look, I don't want to argue. Obviously, nobody else is coming. You're the only one who can help me.
A holocron? What do you mean?
Oh, sure. I get it. I mention a holocron and suddenly you're interested. Fine. We can play it that way.
Agents from House Thul recently recovered an ancient Jedi holocron. They've arranged a meeting with some Sith to hand the holocron over.
What makes this holocron so special?
What's on the holocron?
It contains historical records of atrocities House Thul committed. If that info becomes public, it will weaken their support with the other houses.
Tell me where to find them.
Here's the location for the meeting. Once you get the holocron, take it to Master Dolso of the Jedi. I'll let him know you're coming.
Bye, loser. [Refuse quest]
Fine. Walk away. I'll just find someone else to help me. You'll see!
Please! I have a very important job! I can't have all these distractions!
